431:1: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena rudrako nāma rāmaputro rājagṛhaṃ nāma mahānagaramupanisṛtya viharati sma mahatā śiṣyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saptabhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ|
431:2: sa tebhyo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma|
431:3: adrākṣīt khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputraṃ saṃghegaṇinaṃ gaṇācāryaṃ jñātamabhīpsitaṃ bahujanapūjitaṃ paṇḍitasaṃmatam|
431:4: dṛṣṭvā cāsyaitadabhūt-ayaṃ khalvapi rudrako rāmaputraḥ saṃghegaṇī gaṇācāryaḥ jñāto'bhīpsito bahujanapūjitaḥ paṇḍitasaṃmataḥ|
431:6: naiṣa mamāntike viśiṣṭasaṃjño bhavennāpi pratyakṣajñānena jñāto bhavennāpi saṃskṛtānāṃ sāśravānāṃ sopādānānāṃ dhyānasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ doṣo datto bhavet|
431:7: yannvahaṃ tathārupamupāyamupasaṃdarśayeyaṃ yenaite ca pratyakṣā bhaveyuḥ|
431:8: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca samāpattyārambaṇānāṃ laukikasamādhīnāmaniḥsaraṇatā darśitā bhavet |
431:9: yannvahaṃ rudrakasya rāmaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya svasamādhiguṇaviśeṣodbhāvanārthaṃ śiṣyatvamabhyupagamya saṃskṛtasamādhīnāmasāratāmupadarśayeyamiti||
431:10: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattva idamarthavaśamadhikṛtya yena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat|
431:13: ityevamukte rudrako rāmaputro bodhisattvamevamāha-na me mārṣa kaścicchāstā|
431:14: api tu khalu punaḥ svayameva mayedaṃ samyagadhigatamiti|
431:17: bodhisattva āha-labhemahi vayaṃ bhavataḥ sakāśādavavādānuśāsanīyasya samādhermārgam?
431:20: tato bodhisattva ekāntaṃ gatvā paryaṅkamābhujyopaviśati sma|
431:21: samanantaropaviṣṭasya ca bodhisattvasya puṇyaviśeṣeṇa ca jñānaviśeṣeṇa ca pūrvasucaritacaryāphalaviśeṣeṇa ca sarvasamādhiparicayaviśeṣeṇa ca dhyānapramukhāni sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi samāpattiśatānyāmukhībhavanti sma sākārāṇi soddeśāni yathāpi taccittavaśavartitvāt|
431:22: atha ca bodhisattvaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan utthāyāsanādyena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat|
431:23: upasaṃkramya rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha astyanyo'pi mārṣa kaściduttare naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattermārgaḥ?
431:25: tato bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat-na khalu rudrakasyaivāsti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā|
431:26: mamāpyasti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā|
431:27: atha bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha-mayāpyeṣa mārṣa dharmo'dhigato yatra tvaṃ niryātaḥ|
431:29: tvaṃ cāhaṃ cemaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharāva iti|
431:30: samānārthe ca bodhisattvaṃ sthāpayati sma ācāryasthāne ca|
431:31: bodhisattva āha-naiṣa mārṣa mārgo nirvṛtaye na virāgāya na nirodhāya nopaśamāya nābhijñāyai na saṃbodhaye na śrāmaṇāya na brāhmaṇāya na nirvāṇāya saṃvartate||
431:32: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakasya rāmaputrasya saśiṣyasyāvarjanīkṛtva yāvadalamiti kṛtvā prakrāmat-alaṃ mamāneneti||
431:33: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrake rāmaputre brahmacaryaṃ caranti sma|
431:34: teṣāmetadabhūt-yasya khalu vayamarthāya dīrgharātraṃ ghaṭāmahe udyujyāmahe,
431:35: na ca śaknumo'ntaṃ vā paryantaṃ cādhigantum,
431:42: evaṃ vimṛṣya pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrakarāmaputrasakāśādapakramya bodhisattvamanvabadhnan||
431:43: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya magadheṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmat sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ||
431:44: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāntarācca rājagṛhasya antarācca gayāyā yo'nyatamo gaṇa utsavaṃ karoti sma,
431:45: tena ca gaṇena bodhisattvo'bhinimantrito'bhūt vāsena bhaktena ca sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ||
431:46: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ gayā tāmanusṛtya tāmanuprāpto'bhūt|
431:47: tatra khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ prahāṇārthī viharati sma gayāśīrṣe parvate|
431:48: tatrāsya viharatastisra upamāḥ pratibhānti sma aśrutapūrvā anabhijñātapūrvāḥ|
431:50: ye kecitte khalvapi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo'navakṛṣṭakāyā viharanti sma|
431:52: yāpi caiṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānatā,
431:54: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante|
431:55: atha tarhi abhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum|
431:56: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇīmudake prakṣipya mathnīyāt,
431:58: evameva ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo'navakṛṣṭakāyā anavakṛṣṭacittāśca viharanti,
431:59: yāpyeṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānaṃ tadapyanupaśāntam|
431:60: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante|
431:62: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamā upamā pratibhāti sma||
431:63: bhūyaścāsyaitadabhūt-ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
431:64: yāpi teṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ kartavyaṃ yāvajjyotiṃ paryeṣata iti|
431:65: sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya sthale sthāpayitvā ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ mathnīyāt,
431:67: evameva ye ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ pūrvavatkāryaṃ yāvadabhavyā uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum|
431:68: iyaṃ dvitīyā upamā pratibhāti sma pūrvamaśrutā cāvijñātā ca||
431:69: punaraparaṃ ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bhavantaḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
431:73: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante|
431:74: atha khalu punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum|
431:75: tadyathāpi nāma iha syātpuruṣo'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiḥ paryeṣamāṇaḥ,
431:76: sa śuṣkaṃ kāṣṭhamādāya śuṣkāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ sthale pratiṣṭhāpya mathnīyāt,
431:78: evameva ya ime bhavantaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedayanta iti|
431:79: atha ca punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum|
431:80: iyaṃ tṛtīyā upamā pratibhāti sma aśrutapūrvā ca avijñātapūrvā ca||
431:81: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt-ahaṃ khalvetarhi kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyo viharāmi vyapakṛṣṭacittaśca|
431:82: yāpi me kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ yāvattadapi me upaśāntam|
431:83: kiṃ cāpi ahamātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāmiti peyālaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedmi|
431:85: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ gayāyāṃ vihṛtya gayāśīrṣe parvate jaṅgāvihāramanucaṃkramyamāṇo yenorubilvā senāpatigrāmakastadanusṛtastadanuprāpto'bhūt|
431:86: tatrādrākṣīnnadīṃ nairañjanāmacchodakāṃ sūpatīrthāṃ prāsādikaiśca drumagulmairalaṃkṛtāṃ samantataśca gocaragrāmām|
431:87: tatra khalvapi bodhisattvasya mano'tīva prasannamabhūt-samo batāyaṃ bhūmipradeśo ramaṇīyaḥ pratisaṃlayanānurūpaḥ|
431:91: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhut-pañcakaṣāyakāle'hamiha jambudvīpe'vatīrṇo hīnādhimuktikeṣu sattveṣvākīrṇatīrthyavargeṣu nānādṛṣṭipraskanneṣu kāyapiṇḍagrāhābhiniviṣṭeṣu nānāvidhaiścātāpanaparitāpanaiḥ kāyaśuddhiṃ paryeṣante,
431:96: ekabhaktā ekāhorātracāturthyapañcaṣaṭkālāntarāśca pakṣakṣapaṇamāsakṣapaṇacāndrāyaṇaiśca gṛdhrolūkapakṣadhāraṇaiśca phalamuñjāsanavalkaladarbhabalbajoṣṭrakambalājakambalakeśakambalacarmaniveśanaiśca ārdrapaṭāstopakajālaśayanaiśca bhasmaśarkarāpāṣāṇaphalakakaṇṭakatṛṇamusalaśayanāvākchirotkuṭukasthaṇḍilaśayanaiśca ekavāsadvitricatuṣpañcaṣaṭsaptabahuvāsobhirnagnabhāvaiśca sthānāsthānavidhibhiśca dīrghakeśanakhaśmaśrujaṭāmakuṭadhāraṇaiśca ekakolatilataṇḍulāhāraiśca bhasmamasinirmālyoddhṛtatamorajapāṃśupaṅkaparimrakṣaṇaiśca lomamuñjakeśanakhacīvarapañjarakaraṅkadhāraṇaiśca uṣṇodakataṇḍulodakaparisrāvitakāmbalikasthālīpānīyapānaiśca aṅgāradhātukaṣāyatridaṇḍamuṇḍikakuṇḍikakapālakhaṭvāṅgadhāraṇaiśca śuddhiṃ pratyavagacchanti saṃmūḍhāḥ|
431:109: iha ca kecitparatra manyante svargāpavargāvasmākametebhyo nirvartsyeta iti mithyāmārgaprayātā aśaraṇe śaraṇasaṃjñino'maṅgalye maṅgalasaṃjñino'śuddhyā śuddhiṃ manyatoyannvahaṃ tādṛśaṃ vratatapoviśeṣamālabheyaṃ yathā sarvaparapravādinaśca nigṛhītāḥ syuḥ,
431:111: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ dhyānaviśeṣopadarśanādāvarjanaṃ kuryāmiti||
431:112: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattva evaṃ cintayitvā ṣaḍvarṣikaṃ mahāghoraṃ vratatapaḥsuduṣkarātsuduṣkarāṃ duṣkaracaryāmālabhate sma|
431:116: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā,
431:121: sa caturthadhyānamādita eva samāpadyamāna āśvāsapraśvāsānuparodhayati saṃnirodhayati|
431:122: akalpaṃ tad dhyānamavikalpamaniñjanamapanītamaspandanaṃ sarvatrānugataṃ ca sarvatra cāniśritam|
431:123: na ca tad dhyānaṃ jātu kenacitsamāpannaṃ pūrvaṃ śaiṣyeṇa vā aśaiṣyeṇa vā pratyekabuddhena vā caryāpratipannena vā bodhisattvena|
431:125: ākāśamaspharaṇamakaraṇamavikaraṇaṃ tacca sarvaṃ spharatīti hyākāśasamaṃ tad dhyānam|
431:127: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyāścaryasaṃdarśanārthaṃ tīrthikānāṃ ca darpanirghātanārthaṃ parapravādināṃ ca nigrahārthaṃ devānāṃ cāvarjanārthamucchedaśāśvatavādināṃ ca sattvānāṃ krarmakriyāpraṇaṣṭānāṃ karmakriyāvatāraṇārthaṃ puṇyaphalodbhāvanārthaṃ jñānaphalasaṃdarśanārthaṃ dhyānāṅgavibhajanārtha kāyabalasthāmasaṃdarśanārthaṃ cittaśauryasaṃjananārthaṃ ca asaṃskṛtāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ paryaṅkamābhujya niṣīdati sma|
431:128: niṣadya ca svakāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇīte sma,
431:130: tato me bhikṣavo haimantikāsvaṣṭakarātriṣu tathā kāyaṃ nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma|
431:132: bhūmau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ|
431:133: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣo durbalataraṃ puruṣaṃ grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣpīḍayet,
431:134: evameva bhikṣava imaṃ kāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma|
431:136: bhūbhau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ||
431:137: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-yannvahamāsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyam|
431:138: tato me bhikṣava āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyato mukhato nāsikātaścāśvāsapraśvāsā upaniruddhāvabhūtām|
431:140: tadyathāpi nāma karmāragagayā mathyamānāyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati,
431:141: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikābhyāmāśvāsapraśvāsāvuparuddhāvabhūtāṃ śrotachidrābhyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati sma||
431:142: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-yannvahaṃ bhūya āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyamiti|
431:145: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ puruṣaḥ kuṇḍayā śaktyā śiraḥkapālamupahanyād,
431:146: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikāśrotreṣūparuddheṣu āśvāsapraśvāsā urdhvaṃ śiraḥkapālamupanighnanti sma||
431:147: tāṃ cāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvasya tatra keciddevā evamāhu-kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ kālagato batāyaṃ siddhārthaḥ kumāraḥ|
431:159: atha te devaputrāstrāyatriṃśeṣu deveṣu gatvā māyādevyā evamarthaṃ śrāvayanti-kālagataḥ kumāraḥ|
431:160: atha māyādevī apsarāgaṇaparivṛtā ardharātrasamaye nairañjanāyāstīre yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāntā|
431:164: yadā jāto'si me putra vane lumbinisāhvaye|
431:166: diśāṃ cālokya cature vācā te pravyāhṛtā śubhā|
431:167: iyaṃ me paścimā jātiḥ sā te na paripūritā||4||
431:169: kṣuṇṇaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tasya na dṛṣṭā tena nityatā||5||
431:171: na ca bodhimanuprāpto yāto'si nidhanaṃ vane||6||
431:172: putrārthe kaṃ prapadyāmi kaṃ va krandāmi duḥkhitā|
431:180: mayā tu daśamāsāṃ vai kukṣau vajra ivā dhṛtaḥ|
431:181: sā te'haṃ putrakā mātā vilapāmi suduḥkhitā||9||
431:193: sahaśravaṇādeva devī māyā saṃpraharṣitaromakūpajātā bodhisattvaṃ māndāravapuṣpairabhyavakirya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtvā divyatūryaiḥ saṃpravādyamānairyena svabhavanaṃ tenopajagāma||
431:194: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-santyeke śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye alpāhāratayā śuddhiṃ manyante|
431:197: syātkhalu punarbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ eṣā buddhiḥ-mahattaraṃ tatra kāle kolamāsīditi|
431:200: tasya me bhikṣava ekameva kolamāhāramāharato'dvitīyaṃ kāyo'tyarthaṃ karśito'bhūddurbalaḥ|
431:201: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava āsītakīparvāṇi vā kālāparvāṇi vā,
431:205: tadyathāpi nāma vāhanakāraśālāyāṃ vā hastiśālāyāṃ vā jīrṇāyāmubhayato vivṛtāyāṃ gopānasyāntarikāśca virājante vyavabhāsante,
431:206: evameva me pārśukā antaḥkāye ubhayato virājante sma vyavabhāsante sma|
431:207: tadyathāpi nāma vartanyā veṇī unnatāvanatā bhavati samaviṣamā,
431:209: tadyathā tiktakālābustaruṇo lūna āmlāno bhavati saṃmlānaḥ samutpuṭakajātaḥ evameva śira āmlānamabhūtsaṃmlānaṃ samutpuṭakajātam|
431:210: tadyathāpi nāma grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse kūpatārakā dūragatā bhavanti,
431:212: evameva me'kṣitārakau duragatāvabhūtāṃ kṛcchreṇa saṃprakāśyete sma|
431:215: tato yadāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ pāṇinā kukṣiṃ spṛśāmīti pṛṣṭhikaṇṭakamevāsprākṣam|
431:217: tataḥ kṛcchreṇotthito'pi pāṃśukṛtāni gātrāṇi pāṇinā pramṛjato me pūtiromāṇi kāyācchīryante sma|
431:218: yāpi me'bhūtpaurāṇī śubhavarṇatanuḥ sāpyantaradhādyathāpīdaṃ rūkṣapradhānaṃ prahitātmanaḥ|
431:219: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsina evaṃ saṃjānante sma-kālako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ|
431:224: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-yannvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayālpāhāratayā pratipadyeyamiti|
431:226: syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākamevaṃ mahattaraṃ taṇḍulaṃ tasmin kāle'bhūditi|
431:229: tasya me bhikṣava ekaṃ taṇḍulamāharataḥ kṣipraṃ kāyo'bhūditi pūrvavadyāvanmadguracchavirbata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautama iti|
431:231: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-yannvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayālpāhāratāyai pratipadyeyamiti|
431:235: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhut-santyeke śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye'nāhāratayā śuddhiṃ manyante|
431:238: tasya me bhikṣavo'nāhārasya kāyo'tīva śuṣko'bhūt kṛśo durbalaḥ,
431:239: tadyathāpi nāma āsitakīparvāṇi vā kālāparvāṇi vā|
431:246: kṛcchreṇāpi cotthitaḥ pāṃśukṛtāni me gātrāṇi pramṛjataḥ pūtimūlāni romāṇyaśīryanta|
431:250: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsino janā evaṃ saṃjānante sma-kālako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ|
431:254: rājāpi tadā śuddhodanaḥ pratipratidivasaṃ bodhisattvasyāntike dūtaṃ preṣayati sma||
431:255: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyādbhutakriyāsaṃdarśanārthaṃ pūrvavadyāvatkarmakriyāpraṇaṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ karmakriyāvatāraṇārthaṃ puṇyasaṃcayānāṃ codbhāvanārthaṃ mahājñānasya ca guṇasaṃdarśanārthaṃ dhyānāṅgānāṃ ca vibhajanārthamekatilakolataṇḍulena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaracaryāmanuvartayantamupadarśayati sma|
431:256: adīnamānasaḥ ṣaḍvarṣā bodhisattvo yathā niṣaṇṇa evāsthāt paryaṅkena|
431:259: na ca vātātapavṛṣṭiparitrāṇamakaronna ca daṃśamaśakasarīsṛpānapanayati sma|
431:268: ye ca tatrāgaman grāmakumārakā vā grāmakumārikā vā gopālakā vā paśupālakā vā tṛṇahārikā vā kāṣṭhahārikā vā gomayahārikā vā,
431:273: yadasya karṇaśrotābhyāṃ tṛṇatūlakaṃ prakṣipya nāsāśrotābhyāṃ niṣkāsyate sma|
431:278: ye ca te devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā bodhisattvasya guṇeṣu pratyakṣāḥ,
431:279: te rātriṃdivaṃ samadhiṣṭhā bodhisattvasya pūjāṃ kurvanti sma|
431:281: tatra bodhisattvena tai ṣaḍbhirvarṣairduṣkaracaryāṃ saṃdarśayatā paripūrṇāni dvādaśanayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ tribhiryānaiḥ paripācitānyabhūvan||
431:293: na ca yatra svānubhavatī na cāhitaṃ tena tiṣṭhavākyasya|
431:298: apare bhramanti nagnāḥ satyamidaṃ mohamanyaditi mūḍhāḥ||18||
431:308: yaṃ duṣkaraṃ na śakyaṃ carituṃ devairmanuṣyairvā||23||
431:310: yaṃ dhyānaṃ na samarthāḥ pratyekajināpi darśayitum||24||
431:317: kalpaṃ no na vikalpaṃ na ceñjanaṃ nāpimanyena pracāram|
431:319: na ca ātapātu chāyāṃ chāyāyā nātapaṃ gataścāsau|
431:326: pāṃśupiśācakamiti taṃ manyante pāṃśunā ca mrakṣanti||32||
431:327: aśucīnā ca kirante vividhāste kāraṇāśca kārenti|
431:328: na ca iñjate bhramati vā dhyāyatyāsphānakaṃ dhyānam||33||
431:329: na ca namati no vinamate na kāyaparirakṣaṇā spṛśati|
431:330: kiṃcinnoccāraprasravaṃ śabdeṣu na saṃtrasī na paraprekṣī||34||
431:332: udarācca pṛṣṭhivaṃśo vidṛśyate vartitā yathā veṇī||35||
431:335: praṇidhiṃ ca kurvate te vayamapi tādṛśa bhavāmahe kṣipram|
431:337: na ca kevalamātmārthaṃ na dhyānasvādanānna sukhabuddhyā|
431:340: karmakriyā ca darśita yā proktā kāśyape vācā||39||
431:341: krakucchandakasya bodhi bodhiriha sudurlabhā bahubhi kalpaiḥ|
